rules.headings: Tight tracking (-0.02em). Use font-light (300) for massive hero text, font-semibold (600) for section headers.
rules.body: Relaxed leading (1.6). High contrast text for readability.

texture.noise: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")

landing_page.description: Asymmetrical bento grid. Use col-span-full for hero, mixed spans for features.
landing_page.spacing: Generous (gap-8 to gap-12). Padding p-8 to p-24.

dashboard.description: Dense, data-heavy grid. 4 columns. Widgets stretch to fill height.

buttons.primary: bg-[#ccff00] text-black hover:bg-[#b3e600] rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-semibold tracking-tight transition-transform hover:scale-105 active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white/5 text-white border border-white/10 hover:bg-white/10 rounded-full px-6 py-4 backdrop-blur-md

cards.style: bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10 rounded-2xl p-6 hover:border-[#ccff00]/30 transition-colors duration-300
cards.interaction: Add a subtle glow on hover. Use the 'Tracing Beam' effect for featured cards.

inputs.style: bg-white/5 border border-white/10 rounded-xl px-4 py-3 text-white placeholder:text-white/30 focus:border-[#ccff00]/50 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#ccff00]/50 transition-all

navigation.sidebar: Fixed left, w-64, h-screen, bg-black/80 backdrop-blur-xl border-r border-white/10. Links use ghost variant with left-border indicator on active.

motion.micro_interactions: Buttons scale slightly on hover. Cards lift (-2px) on hover.

hero_background.usage: Hero section background with heavy overlay (opacity 0.3)

feature_abstract.usage: Feature cards or 'How it works' section background

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px. Color matches text-secondary or accent.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Apply the dark theme variables to 'index.css' first. Ensure background is #050505.
3. FONTS: Import Outfit and Plus Jakarta Sans in 'index.css' or 'App.css'.
4. LAYOUT: Build the Landing Page using the 'Tetris Grid'. Do not use a simple centered container.
5. DASHBOARD: Build the Dashboard using the 'Control Room Grid'. Use a Sidebar layout.
6. COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn logic but OVERRIDE the styles with the 'visual_enhancers' defined above. No default white cards.
7. GLASSMORPHISM: Apply 'backdrop-blur-xl' to the Sidebar and Header.
8. CRITICAL: Do not use gradients for text. Keep text solid #ededed for readability.
9. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' (generic centered layouts, default blue/purple gradients).
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical (p-8, p-12).
Every interaction must have a micro-animation (hover, focus, active).
Never use pure black (#000000) for backgrounds, use #050505.
Ensure contrast ratios meet WCAG AA (4.5:1) for text.
